text: Art Angel is a Philippine television informative show broadcast by GMA Network. Originally hosted by Pia Arcangel, Tonipet Gaba and Krystal Reyes. It premiered on April 17, 2004. In 2010, Arcangel and Reyes left the show and were replaced by Roxanne Barcelo on June 19, 2010. The show concluded on May 14, 2011 with a total of 370 episodes. It was replaced by Sabadabadog! in its timeslot. ==Accolades== {| class="wikitable" |+ Accolades received by Art Angel ! Year ! Award ! Category ! Recipient !
